value.name: Psychology Today
value.description: The current mode of American police work is badly flawed. It costs precious lives and millions of dollars for cities. There is another radically different model for police work that could be easily instituted.

value.name: Teen nursery worker guilty of raping girl, 3, and sexually abusing 8 others
value.description: A former nursery assistant has been found guilty of carrying out a series of sex attacks on toddlers where he worked. Jayden McCarthy, 18, faces prison after he was convicted of three rapes and 13 sexual assaults by a jury after a two-week trial at Exeter Crown Court.
